column4: Hello, i am using xubuntu and i was messing with the top bar where i have all the proggrams listed and it some how gone how can i restore that top bar?
Yes you can....
You need to type xfce4-panel
..how?
how can i have a command line now?
oh
alt f2
thn type xfce4-panel
nothing happend, i do see the panel object but it got into little square in the top left side of the screen
try right clicking on the panel
and add items
you probably have to add an applications menu
humm i dont have an "application menu" option.. :(
right click and select "add new item"
then add "xfce menu"
ok i see the xfce menu now but its not what i had before its a big button with x and a mouse on it :)
Yea that happened to me as well.  I had the same problem you did.
You can create sessions in xfce4.
hello
: i found the problem i hide that panel behin the bottem panel i managed to restore it now, thanks
no problem. Glad to help.
